title: HiveMind v3.0 Relational Cognitive Engine
description:
Transform HiveMind from a passive 'Flat-File Markdown Logger' into an active Relational Cognitive Engine powered by CQRS, Graph-RAG, the Actor Model, and a strict architectural taxonomy.

## Completed Stories (Phase 1-3) ✅
- US-001: Graph node Zod schemas ✅
- US-002: Graph state aggregates ✅
- US-003: Paths for graph directory ✅
- US-004: Compaction engine extraction ✅
- US-005: Session engine extraction ✅
- US-006: Inspect engine extraction ✅
- US-007: Brownfield scan extraction ✅
- US-008: Session split extraction ✅
- US-009: Tool response helper ✅
- US-010: Cognitive packer core ✅
- US-011: Time Machine filter ✅
- US-012: TTS (Time-To-Stale) filter ✅
- US-013: XML compression with budget ✅
- US-014: Graph I/O layer ✅
- US-015: Wire packer to messages-transform ✅
- US-016: Implement Pre-Stop Gate checklist ✅
- US-017: Refactor session-lifecycle to use packer ✅

## Phase 4 Complete ✅
- US-018: Graph migration script ✅
- US-019: Dual-read backward compat ✅
- US-020: 80% session splitter ✅
- US-021: Headless researcher swarms ✅
- US-022: Trajectory write-through ✅

## Ghost Ship P0 Fixes Complete ✅
- P0-CONCURRENCY: File mutex added via proper-lockfile (commit 06d2a7f) ✅
- P0-4-RETRIEVAL: Session-scoped memory retrieval with proximity ranking (commit 1719ff5) ✅
- P1-ANTIPATTERN: Time Machine compresses false_path to <anti_patterns> (commits 5c8fcd3, 9658d78) ✅
- P1-ID-ECHO: Tools echo generated UUID in response (commit 965f8c4) ✅
- P1-BUDGET: XML budget scales to 12% context window ~15360 chars (commit fff5e01) ✅

## Split-Brain Chimera Fixes (In Progress)
- CHIMERA-1: Wire tools to graph-io (in progress)
- CHIMERA-2: Wire Zod quarantine
- CHIMERA-3: Enforce JSON responses
- CHIMERA-4: Swarm SDK execution
- CHIMERA-5: Cursor restore fix
- CHIMERA-6: UI pollution + zombie toast

## Remaining Stories (Phase 5-7)
- Phase 5: US-023 to US-025 (Tool Consolidation)
- Phase 6: US-026 to US-031 (Testing & Verification)
- Phase 7: US-032 to US-050 (OpenTUI Dashboard)

## Open Architectural Patches
- P0-RUNTIME: Dashboard spawns as detached child process, uses cmd_queue.jsonl for IPC
- P0-VALIDATION: Read-time Zod uses .catch(), quarantines orphans to graph/orphans.json
- P1-AMNESIA: 80% splitter captures last 6 messages as <recent_dialogue>
